strings:
<voice_0x01000E41><se_def>Bartender: Okay, so tell me what happened the other day.
The suspense is killing me!

<voice_0x01000E42><se_def>*: All right, all right, already!
But you've got to keep this under your hat, okay?
This is between you and me.

<voice_0x01000E43><se_def>Bartender: I swear I won't say a word.
We barmen know when to keep our mouths shut.

<voice_0x01000E44><se_def>*: By the Goddess, lower your voice!
I assume you've heard about Mr. Golding's
house being burgled.
<voice_0x01000E45><se_def>*: Well, the fact is, Mr. Golding was murdered during the robbery.

<voice_0x01000E46><se_def>Bartender: MURDERED!?
You mean Mr. Golding is DEAD!?

<voice_0x01000E47><se_def>*: I told you to keep it down!
That's why nobody's seen hide nor hair of him recently. He isn't among the living any more.

<voice_0x01000E48><se_def>Bartender: But Mr. Golding was such a big man!
You're trying to tell me he was killed by a random burglar!?

<voice_0x01000E49><se_def>*: Well, the really weird thing about it
was that the burglar was apparently dressed
as a jester!

<voice_0x01000E4A><se_def>*: I didn't see him myself, mind you,
but that's what they say.
<voice_0x01000E4B><se_def>Bartender: A jester, huh?

<voice_0x01000E4C><se_def>*: A strange one, this burglar.
Seems he broke in, killed Mr. Golding, and left.
He didn't take anything valuable.

<voice_0x01000E4D><se_def>*: From the looks of it, he was after
Mr. Golding's life, not his gold.
<voice_0x01000E4E><se_def>*: I also heard that Cash and Carrie have ordered some men to find the jester and avenge their father's death.

<voice_0x01000E4F><se_def>Bartender: By the Goddess! This is big...
I won't tell a soul. You can count on me.

<voice_0x01000E50><se_def>Bartender: I'd better get back to my customers.
See you later.
<voice_0x01000E51><se_def>Bartender: GAH!

<voice_0x01000E52><se_def>Bartender: I'm sorry.
I did not see you standing there.

<voice_0x01000E53><se_def>Bartender: Did you...
Did you hear what we were talking about?

<voice_0x01000E54><se_def>Bartender: Ah, forgive me for the strange question.
A slip of the tongue! I'd better get back to work.
